content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 4, Roma 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 4, Roma 1.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Edin Dzeko.
Bruno Peres (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Denis Suárez (Barcelona).
Attempt missed. Aleksandar Kolarov (Roma) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Foul by Denis Suárez (Barcelona).
Gregoire Defrel (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Roma 1. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Kevin Strootman (Roma) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Kevin Strootman (Roma).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Barcelona. Denis Suárez replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Foul by André Gomes (Barcelona).
Diego Perotti (Roma) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Barcelona. André Gomes replaces Sergi Roberto.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Foul by Gerard Piqué (Barcelona).
Gregoire Defrel (Roma) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Roma 1. Edin Dzeko (Roma) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Diego Perotti.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Marc-André ter Stegen.
Attempt saved. Diego Perotti (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Kevin Strootman.
Attempt saved. Gregoire Defrel (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Stephan El Shaarawy.
Substitution, Roma. Gregoire Defrel replaces Daniele De Rossi.

Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.

Substitution, Roma. Stephan El Shaarawy replaces Alessandro Florenzi.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic following a corner.
Substitution, Barcelona. Paulinho replaces Sergio Busquets.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Bruno Peres.

Substitution, Roma. Maxime Gonalons replaces Lorenzo Pellegrini.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Roma 0. Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal.

Attempt missed. Diego Perotti (Roma) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Alessandro Florenzi with a cross.
